name: What a Legend!
summary:
The story is about a young man that goes to the biggest city of the realm to lose his virginity but ends up meeting a mysterious woman who sends him on an epic quest.

A quest full of sexual encounters, unhappy housewives, beautiful damsels, comely magical creatures, and the chance to become a legend.​
info:
• 中文名: 旷世传奇
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 游戏制作: MagicNuts
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2020-05-01
  • 官方网站: https://whatalegendgame.com/
